channel.title: Comments on: Early bird tickets sold out!

item.title: By: Michael Epstein
item.dc:creator: Michael Epstein
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2011/08/09/early-bird-tickets-sold-out/#comment-509">Marianne Petit</a>.
When can we find out If there are any spare tickets? I'm in need of two!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Marianne Petit.

When can we find out If there are any spare tickets? I’m in need of two!

item.title: By: Marianne Petit
item.dc:creator: Marianne Petit
item.description: Associate Arts Professor, Interactive Telecommunications Program, NYU, 721 Broadway 4th floor NY NY 10003
